tier.item: b. Joni so se j ed li struklji
The FEEL-LIKE Dative-Reflexive Construction in Slovenian
JonaDAT AUXPl REFL eat3,Pl,Masc,Past dumplingsMa
(Franc Marusic ­ Stony Brook University and Rok Zaucer ­ University of Ottawa) sc,Pl,NOM
<franc.marusic@stonybrook.edu> <rzauc027@uottawa.ca> 'Jona felt like eating dumplings.'
b. Joni so se j ed li struklji
The FEEL-LIKE Dative-Reflexive Construction in Slovenian
JonaDAT AUXPl REFL eat3,Pl,Masc,Past dumplingsMa
(Franc Marusic ­ Stony Brook University and Rok Zaucer ­ University of Ottawa) sc,Pl,NOM
<franc.marusic@stonybrook.edu> <rzauc027@uottawa.ca> 'Jona felt like eating dumplings.'
b. Joni so se j ed li struklji
The FEEL-LIKE Dative-Reflexive Construction in Slovenian
JonaDAT AUXPl REFL eat3,Pl,Masc,Past dumplingsMa
(Franc Marusic ­ Stony Brook University and Rok Zaucer ­ University of Ottawa) sc,Pl,NOM
<franc.marusic@stonybrook.edu> <rzauc027@uottawa.ca> 'Jona felt like eating dumplings.
(1) Janezu se hribolazi neuter, third person, & singular (could be seen as default (R&MS 2003)).
JanezDAT REFL mountain-climb3P,Sg,Neu
'Janez feels like mountain-climbing' Impersonal FEEL-LIKE: probably default

(2) Lini se se ne ljubi priti ven. disposition, (1), etc.
LinaDAT REFL still NEG feels-like come out
'Lina still doesn't feel like coming out.' Unlike Tense inflection, Aspect inflection (perfect/imperfect) on the verb

The reflexive clitic (Rivero & Milojevi-Sheppard 2003): (4) Masi se ful objame / objema Vida.
o Indefinite reflexive clitic. Defective ­ it only has a human feature MasaDAT REFL very hugPF / hugIMPF VidACC
and no gender, number or person. 'Masa feels like hugging Vid (=like giving Vid a hug / holding Vid).'
The reflexive clitic (Rivero & Milojevi-Sheppard 2003): (4) Masi se ful objame / objema Vida.
o Indefinite reflexive clitic. Defective ­ it only has a human feature MasaDAT REFL very hugPF / hugIMPF VidACC
and no gender, number or person. 'Masa feels like hugging Vid (=like giving Vid a hug / holding Vid).'
The reflexive clitic (Rivero & Milojevi-Sheppard 2003): (4) Masi se ful objame / objema Vida.
o Indefinite reflexive clitic.Defective ­ it only has a human feature MasaDAT REFL very hugPF / hugIMPF VidACC
and no gender, number or person. 'Masa feels like hugging Vid (=like giving Vid a hug / holding Vid).
o Reflexive clitic is nominative (5) Masi se objema Zeusa.
o No other nominative DP in the tensed sentence. MasaDAT REFL hug ZeusACC
o Object in accusative = not a passive construction, but active. 'Masa feels like hugging Zeus.'
o Reflexive clitic is nominative (5) Masi se objema Zeusa.
o No other nominative DP in the tensed sentence. MasaDAT REFL hug ZeusACC
o Object in accusative = not a passive construction, but active. 'Masa feels like hugging Zeus.'
o Reflexive clitic is nominative (5) Masi se objema Zeusa.
o No other nominative DP in the tensed sentence.MasaDAT REFL hug ZeusACC
o Object in accusative = not a passive construction, but active. 'Masa feels like hugging Zeus.
(3) a. Lini se je jedlo struklje (6) a. Vidu se bere Mateja Bora.
LinaDAT REFL AUXSg eat3,Sg,Neu,Past dumplings REFL read Matej BorACC
VidDAT
Masc,Pl,ACC
'Lina felt like eating dumplings.' 'Vid feels like reading (poetry by) Matej Bor.'

b. Vidu se bere Vladimirja Pavsica. Sententional view makes a stronger theoretical claim.
· We want to argue that Slovenian FEEL-LIKE constructions is best
REFL read Vladimir PavsicACC
VidDAT

(7) Toncku se pogovarja s partizanom.

'Toncek feels like talking to a Partisan.'

(8) tense morphology belongs to the upper clause (FEEL-LIKE).
JanezDAT dance o CP > TP > ... AspP > ... vP (Giorgi & Pianesi 1997,Cinque 1999)
REFL AUX
'Janez felt like dancing' Asp ­ the highest functional head in the lower clause for which

(11) Ta moment se mi res ne gre v torek domov.
grammatical structure (e.g. McCawley 1970, Larson &
this moment REFL IDAT really not goPres on Tuesday home
Ludlow 1993, Larson 2002)
'Right now I really don't feel like going home on Tuesday.'

(17) a. Ob tej uri
At this time JNOM usually still delivers mail
The embedded clause has no TP (cf. (9)). The temporal adverbial originates
'At this time, Janez is usually still delivering mail.'

· Two clauses are suggested also by the three way ambiguity of (18a).
frequently REFL IDAT run more rarely
Both adverbs can be associated with either the matrix clause or the
'I often feel like running more rarely.'

(16) *Kok se mi v torek ne [ gre ta moment na Dunaj]. 'Janez usually still feels-like [ buying at the market ].'
how REFL IDAT on Tuesday not goPres this moment to Vienna
c. Janezu se obicajno FEEL-LIKE [ se vedno kupuje na trznici ].
'Gee, how I don't feel on Tuesday like going to Vienna right now.'

tier.item: (20) Meni se treznemu ne gre v solo g o l,
IDAT REFL soberDAT not go to school nakedNOM, (24) V tem trenutku so nasi junija 2004 na Portugalskem.
At this moment AUX ours June 2004 in Portugal
(pijanemu pa ze mogoce)
'At this moment our team is in Portugal in June 2004.'
drunkDAT PTCL PTCL maybe
'When sober, I don't feel like [going to school naked] (but when
o 1. Are these also two events?
drunk, I just might)'

(22) A: Mi smo zrli kot prasci, Vidu se pa kao ni jed l o . (27) a. Med vojno se mi je po vojni hodilo vsak dan na Krn.
During the war I felt like after the war going on Krn every day.
weNOM AUX ate like pigs, VidDAT REFL PTCL as-if NEG-AUX eat
'We were all eating like pigs, while Vid supposedly didn't feel like eating'

A: Mi smo zrli kot prasci, Vidu se pa kao ni jed l o . (27) a. Med vojno se mi je po vojni hodilo vsak dan na Krn.

weNOM AUX ate like pigs, VidDAT REFL PTCL as-if NEG-AUX eat
We were all eating like pigs, while Vid supposedly didn't feel like eating
Vid: Ni se mi ravno ne jedlo, le ni se mi zrlo ko prascu
NEG-AUX REFL IDAT really not eat but NEG-AUX REFL IDAT eat as pig
Polish vs. Slovenian: R&MS are able to assign the Polish and Slovenian
'I didn't exactly feel like not eating, I just didn't feel like eating like a pig'

tier.item: (29) Janku se je bralo knjige
b. *lustal se mi je lustat delat.
read3P,Sg,Neu booksACC
JankoDAT REFL AUX
'I felt like feeling like working.'
'Janko felt like reading books'

(30) *?Danes se mi si je jagode.
IDAT REFL AUX take down trees
today REFL meDAT REFLDAT eat strawberries 3P,Sg,Neu
'I felt like taking down trees.'
'Today I feel like feeling like eating strawberries.'
